title: Tamayo Perry, 'Pirates Of The Caribbean' Actor, Killed In Shark Attack
content: The 49-year-old had also appeared in Charlie's Angels: Full Throttle and Blue Crush, as per the Sky News report.
summary: The 49-year-old had also appeared in Charlie's Angels: Full Throttle and Blue Crush, as per the Sky News report.

title: China Issues New Guidelines To Punish Taiwan "Separatists"
content: Democracy is not a crime and autocracy is the real "evil", Taiwan President Lai Ching-te said on Monday after China threatened to impose the death penalty in extreme cases for "diehard" Taiwan independence separatists.
summary: Democracy is not a crime and autocracy is the real "evil", Taiwan President Lai Ching-te said on Monday after China threatened to impose the death penalty in extreme cases for "diehard" Taiwan independence separatists.

title: Sweden's Youth Homes: A Hub for Gang Recruitment Amid Rising Gun Violence
content: The killer was only 14 and had lived in youth homes as a ward of the authorities since he was eight.
summary: The killer was only 14 and had lived in youth homes as a ward of the authorities since he was eight.

title: "Sold Labour's Soul": Critics Slam UK Labour Party's Shift Under Starmer
content: Sabia Akram has spent most of her life campaigning for Britain's opposition Labour Party but she will not celebrate if it wins the July 4 election, having quit over leader Keir Starmer's handling of issues around the war in Gaza and race.
summary: Sabia Akram has spent most of her life campaigning for Britain's opposition Labour Party but she will not celebrate if it wins the July 4 election, having quit over leader Keir Starmer's handling of issues around the war in Gaza and race.

title: 20 Bodies Found As Fire Breaks Out In S Korea Battery Factory: Report
content: Around 20 bodies have been found at a South Korean lithium battery factory after a massive blaze on Monday, the Yonhap news agency said, with firefighters saying they were still searching the building.
summary: Around 20 bodies have been found at a South Korean lithium battery factory after a massive blaze on Monday, the Yonhap news agency said, with firefighters saying they were still searching the building.

title: Children Starve As Millions Of Gaza Inhabitants Face Famine Threat
content: Nearly 166 million people worldwide are estimated to need urgent action against hunger, according to the Integrated Food Security Phase Classification (IPC), a global partnership which measures food insecurity.
summary: Nearly 166 million people worldwide are estimated to need urgent action against hunger, according to the Integrated Food Security Phase Classification (IPC), a global partnership which measures food insecurity.

title: Concerns Mount As Hungary Assumes EU Presidency Under PM Orban
content: Hungary takes over the European Union's six-month rotating presidency on July 1, in the face of fears perennial spoiler Prime Minister Viktor Orban could use it to take the bloc hostage at a critical time.
summary: Hungary takes over the European Union's six-month rotating presidency on July 1, in the face of fears perennial spoiler Prime Minister Viktor Orban could use it to take the bloc hostage at a critical time.

title: Solar System May Soon Have A Ninth Planet. Courtesy: An Advanced Telescope
content: As per NASA, the composition of Planet X is like Neptune, but its mass could be 10 times that of Earth.
summary: As per NASA, the composition of Planet X is like Neptune, but its mass could be 10 times that of Earth.

title: "Symbol Of India-UAE Friendship": S Jaishankar Visits Abu Dhabi's Temple
content: Mr Jaishankar visited the BAPS Hindu Mandir in Abu Dhabi, which was inaugurated by Prime Minister Narendra Modi on February 14 this year.
summary: Mr Jaishankar visited the BAPS Hindu Mandir in Abu Dhabi, which was inaugurated by Prime Minister Narendra Modi on February 14 this year.

title: Gunmen Attack Churches, Synagogues In Russia; Cops, Priest Among 15 Killed
content: More than 15 people, including policemen and a priest, were killed and several others injured after unidentified gunmen opened fire at a synagogue, a church, and a police post in Russia's North Caucasus region of Dagestan on Sunday.
summary: More than 15 people, including policemen and a priest, were killed and several others injured after unidentified gunmen opened fire at a synagogue, a church, and a police post in Russia's North Caucasus region of Dagestan on Sunday.

title: Abortion Rights To Feature In Biden-Trump's First Presidential Debate
content: Two years after the US Supreme Court stripped constitutional protections for abortion, the explosive issue will feature prominently in Thursday's debate between Joe Biden and Donald Trump -- with the Republican under pressure not to alienate voters.
summary: Two years after the US Supreme Court stripped constitutional protections for abortion, the explosive issue will feature prominently in Thursday's debate between Joe Biden and Donald Trump -- with the Republican under pressure not to alienate voters.

title: 9 Dead And Many Buildings Torched As Fresh Unrest Erupts In New Caledonia
content: Several buildings, including a police station and a town hall, were set on fire in New Caledonia overnight, authorities said Monday, as the French Pacific territory was hit by a fresh surge of unrest.
summary: Several buildings, including a police station and a town hall, were set on fire in New Caledonia overnight, authorities said Monday, as the French Pacific territory was hit by a fresh surge of unrest.

title: Russia-N Korea Defence Deal Could Create Friction With China: US Officer
content: Russian President Vladimir Putin's mutual defence agreement with North Korea has the potential to create friction with China, which has long been the reclusive state's main ally, the top U.S. military officer said on Sunday.
summary: Russian President Vladimir Putin's mutual defence agreement with North Korea has the potential to create friction with China, which has long been the reclusive state's main ally, the top U.S. military officer said on Sunday.

title: Indian Man Shot Dead During Texas Robbery Came To US 8 Months Ago
content: In a tragic incident, a 32-year-old Indian-origin man was fatally shot during a robbery at a convenience store in the US state of Texas.
summary: In a tragic incident, a 32-year-old Indian-origin man was fatally shot during a robbery at a convenience store in the US state of Texas.

title: Russia Pins Blame On US For Deadly Missile Attack On Crimea That Killed 4
content: Russia on Sunday said the United States had responsibility for a Ukrainian missile attack on Russian-annexed Crimea, which it said killed four people, including two children, and wounded over 100.
summary: Russia on Sunday said the United States had responsibility for a Ukrainian missile attack on Russian-annexed Crimea, which it said killed four people, including two children, and wounded over 100.

title: Thousands Participate In Yoga Day Events In Texas, Nearby States Amid Heat
content: Amidst the scorching Texas heat, thousands of yoga enthusiasts gathered across the state to embrace the timeless practice of yoga during the month-long celebrations of the 10th International Day of Yoga 2024.
summary: Amidst the scorching Texas heat, thousands of yoga enthusiasts gathered across the state to embrace the timeless practice of yoga during the month-long celebrations of the 10th International Day of Yoga 2024.

title: Iran-Backed Houthis Target 2 Ships In Red Sea, Indian Ocean
content: A drone attack damaged a merchant ship in the Red Sea near Yemen Sunday, two maritime security agencies said, as Iran-backed Houthi rebels announced naval attacks in the vital trade route.
summary: A drone attack damaged a merchant ship in the Red Sea near Yemen Sunday, two maritime security agencies said, as Iran-backed Houthi rebels announced naval attacks in the vital trade route.

title: Universal Practice: S Jaishankar Leads Yoga Day Celebrations In Abu Dhabi
content: External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar on Sunday participated in the 10th International Day of Yoga celebrations in Abu Dhabi.
summary: External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar on Sunday participated in the 10th International Day of Yoga celebrations in Abu Dhabi.

title: 8 Palestinians Killed In Israeli Strike At Gaza Aid Centre, Say Witnesses
content: Eight Palestinians were killed on Sunday in an Israeli airstrike on a training college near Gaza City being used to distribute aid, Palestinian witnesses said, as Israeli tanks pushed further into the southern city of Rafah.
summary: Eight Palestinians were killed on Sunday in an Israeli airstrike on a training college near Gaza City being used to distribute aid, Palestinian witnesses said, as Israeli tanks pushed further into the southern city of Rafah.

title: Apple Holds Talks With Rival Meta Over Artificial Intelligence: Report
content: Apple is talking to major rival Meta about integrating the Facebook parent company's generative AI into its products, as it tries to catch up with rivals on artificial intelligence, the Wall Street Journal reported Sunday.
summary: Apple is talking to major rival Meta about integrating the Facebook parent company's generative AI into its products, as it tries to catch up with rivals on artificial intelligence, the Wall Street Journal reported Sunday.
